# 32-Bit Signed Integer Vectors

**API Collection**

Perform operations on vectors that contain signed 32-bit integer elements.

## Vector Data Types

- **simd_int1**: A vector of one 32-bit signed integer element.
- **simd_int2**: A vector of two 32-bit signed integer elements.
- **simd_int3**: A vector of three 32-bit signed integer elements.
- **simd_int4**: A vector of four 32-bit signed integer elements.
- **simd_int8**: A vector of eight 32-bit signed integer elements.
- **simd_int16**: A vector of sixteen 32-bit signed integer elements.

## Packed Vector Data Types

- **simd_packed_int2**: A packed vector of two 32-bit signed integer elements.
- **simd_packed_int4**: A packed vector of four 32-bit signed integer elements.
- **simd_packed_int8**: A packed vector of eight 32-bit signed integer elements.
- **simd_packed_int16**: A packed vector of sixteen 32-bit signed integer elements.

## Signed Integer Vectors

- **8-Bit Signed Integer Vectors**: Perform operations on vectors that contain signed 8-bit integer elements.
- **16-Bit Signed Integer Vectors**: Perform operations on vectors that contain signed 16-bit integer elements.
- **64-Bit Signed Integer Vectors**: Perform operations on vectors that contain signed 64-bit integer elements.
